refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: struct GnomePrintUnit
enum GnomePrintUnitBase
GNOME_PRINT_PS_UNIT
refsect2.para: The GnomePrintUnit structure that represents the absolute units.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_UNITS_ALL
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for all of the different GNOME_PRINT_UNIT_* macros.

refsect2.title: gnome_print_unit_get_identity ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the GnomePrintUnit structure referenced by base base.

listitem.simpara: The base of the GnomePrintUnit to retrieve
The GnomePrintUnit structure representing base. NULL on error

refsect2.title: gnome_print_unit_get_default ()
refsect2.para: Used to get the default GnomePrintUnit structure.

listitem.simpara: A pointer to the default GnomePrintUnit structure

refsect2.title: gnome_print_unit_get_by_name ()
refsect2.para: Get a unit based on its name, for example "Millimeter" or "Inches".

listitem.simpara: Name of the unit, as a string pointer
A constant pointer to a GnomePrintUnit, NULL on error

refsect2.title: gnome_print_unit_get_by_abbreviation ()
refsect2.para: Get a unit based on its abbreviation, for example "cm" "pts" or "in".

listitem.simpara: Abbreviation of the unit, as a string pointer
A constant pointer to a GnomePrintUnit, NULL on error

refsect2.title: gnome_print_unit_get_list ()
refsect2.para: Gets a list of the units represented by the bases bases. To get a list of all units then use GNOME_PRINT_UNITS_ALL. The list that is returned should be freed using gnome_print_unit_free_list.

listitem.simpara: The bases to include in the list
A pointer to a GList, NULL on error

refsect2.title: gnome_print_unit_free_list ()
refsect2.para: Used to free the list of units created by gnome_print_unit_get_list.

listitem.simpara: A pointer to a GList to be freed

refsect2.title: gnome_print_convert_distance ()
refsect2.para: Check whether a conversion between from and to can be made

listitem.simpara: The distance to convert, and the converted value on success
Units to convert from
Units to convert to
TRUE if the conversion is possible, FALSE if it is not or on error

refsect2.title: gnome_print_convert_distance_full ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gnome_print_convert_distance_full (gdouble *distance, const GnomePrintUnit *from, const GnomePrintUnit *to, gdouble ctmscale, gdouble devicescale);
refsect2.para: Convert a distance from one unit to another. You should supply a scale as necessary.
ctmscale is userspace->absolute, devicescale is device->absolute

listitem.simpara: The distance to convert, and the result on success
Units to convert from
Units to convert to
The userspace scale to use
The device scale to use
TRUE if the conversion is possible, FALSE if it is not or on error
